name: Asian Beef Stir-fry
description: One of the top ten recommended foods, broccoli is rich in vitamins and minerals, and may help prevent cancer.

ingredients.name: lean ground beef, chicken, pork, or soy

preparation: Heat a Wok or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Add beef and Minced Garlic. Stir-fry for 3–5 minutes. Add broccoli.
Whisk together cornstarch and Vegetable Broth and add to pan.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer uncovered for approximately 5 minutes, or until broccoli is tender-crisp and sauce thick. Add chili peppers, if desired. Serve.
tips: Serve on a bed of steamed brown rice. Also delicious served hot or cold with noodles, or in a wrap.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice & noodle dish.
